_doc: Overlay bitfield patches - controls which offensive spells monsters HAVE.
Applied to output/BLAZE.ALL overlay code before BIN injection.
Each entry = one zone. Affects ALL floors and ALL monster types in that zone.
Only change enabled and bitfield_value. The offsets are internal MIPS
addresses found by reverse engineering - do NOT modify them.
This is the INIT value. The level-up simulation may add more spells on top
based on monster level. Cannot give different spells to different monster types.
Bitfield quick reference (see Data/spells/MONSTER_SPELLS.md for full table):
0x0000001F = Tier 1: FireBullet, SparkBullet, WaterBullet, StoneBullet, Striking
0x03FFFFFF = Tier 1-5: +Explosion, Thunderbolt, FreezeBeast, EarthJavelin, DeathSpell, Teleport
